selected_quotes: Now published (was previously a working paper): study shows school funding increases == higher HS grad rates
One more nail in the coffin of the money doesn't matter argument!
Check out my awesome colleague's new paper!
A new study shows school funding increases are correlated with higher HS graduation rates
Too bad nobody in #mileg reads (or comprehends) valid research. #miched
